text: The Yellow Rolls-Royce is a 1964 British romantic comedy drama movie directed by Anthony Asquith and stars Rex Harrison, Shirley MacLaine, Omar Sharif, Ingrid Bergman, George C. Scott, Jeanne Moreau, Art Carney, Edmund Purdom, Roland Culver, Riccardo Garrone. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and was nominated for 2 BAFTAS. ==Other websites== * ==References== Category:1964 romantic comedy movies Category:1964 romantic drama movies Category:1964 comedy-drama movies Category:British romantic comedy movies Category:British romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Anthony Asquith Category:MGM movies Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in Italy Category:Movies set in Croatia Category:Movies set in the 1920s Category:Movies set in the 1930s Category:Movies set in the 1940s
title: The Yellow Rolls-Royce
